byline.contributor: Nicole Perlroth reported from San Francisco, and Michael D. Shear from Washington.
byline.original: By NICOLE PERLROTH and MICHAEL D. SHEAR

abstract: Private security firm Dell SecureWorks concludes Russian foreign intelligence service GRU was behind hacking of email account of Hillary Clinton’s campaign chairman John D Podesta; reveals methods and links used by hackers.
lead_paragraph: The security group concluded that Hillary Clinton’s campaign chairman was hacked by the same Russian foreign intelligence service that hacked the D.N.C.
snippet: The security group concluded that Hillary Clinton’s campaign chairman was hacked by the same Russian foreign intelligence service that hacked the D.N.C....

headline.main: Private Security Group Says Russia Was Behind John Podesta’s Email Hack
headline.print_headline: Private Security Group Says Russia Was Behind Hack of Clinton Campaign Chairman
